dialogs.id: Absolutely! Give me the good stuff!
dialogs.text: Absolutely! Give me the good stuff!
dialogs.nextId: Absolutely! Give me the good stuff!_line1

dialogs.id: Absolutely! Give me the good stuff!_line1
dialogs.speaker: Pawblo Escobar
dialogs.text: Seems like you're not as smart as you look.
dialogs.nextId: Absolutely! Give me the good stuff!_line2

dialogs.id: Absolutely! Give me the good stuff!_line2
dialogs.speaker: Pawblo Escobar
dialogs.text: The Meowdellin Clawtel would have no use for you.
dialogs.nextId: Absolutely! Give me the good stuff!_line3

dialogs.id: Absolutely! Give me the good stuff!_line3
dialogs.speaker: Pawblo Escobar
dialogs.text: Now that's all sorted out, send me through one of these fancy doors, will you?
dialogs.nextId: Absolutely! Give me the good stuff!_branch

dialogs.id: Eep! On second thought, I think I’ll paw-ss…_line1
dialogs.speaker: Pawblo Escobar
dialogs.text: Your loss, kid.
dialogs.nextId: Eep! On second thought, I think I’ll paw-ss…_line2

dialogs.id: Eep! On second thought, I think I’ll paw-ss…_line2
dialogs.speaker: Pawblo Escobar
dialogs.text: Just remember, the cats of always aren't interested in the kittens of never.

dialogs.id: Eep! On second thought, I think I’ll paw-ss…_branch

dialogs.id: How did you manage to smuggle catnip in here?!
dialogs.text: How did you manage to smuggle catnip in here?!
dialogs.nextId: How did you manage to smuggle catnip in here?!_line1

dialogs.id: How did you manage to smuggle catnip in here?!_line1
dialogs.speaker: Pawblo Escobar
dialogs.text: Now, are you interested in a little bit of the good old //Nepeta cataria// or not?
dialogs.nextId: How did you manage to smuggle catnip in here?!_branch

dialogs.id: How did you manage to smuggle catnip in here?!_branch
dialogs.text: Now, are you interested in a little bit of the good old //Nepeta cataria// or not?

choices.text: Mom said I shouldn’t sniff any catnip, because it can turn me into an orange cat…
choices.nextId: Mom said I shouldn’t sniff any catnip, because it can turn me into an orange cat…

dialogs.text: You know, there are 200 million orange cats manipulated by a million Abyssinian cats.
